metadata.title: CVE-2021-21255 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is an open-source asset and IT management software package thatprovides ITIL Service Desk features, licenses tracking and softwareauditing. In GLPI version 9.5.3, it was possible to switch entities withIDOR from a logged in user. This is fixed in version 9.5.4.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
